analysis.summary: Jeffrey Epstein sent an email in February 2016 with the subject 'TRUMP! POPE SCORECARD' containing an attachment that appears to compare or rate Donald Trump and the Pope, sent from his personal email account with a business signature referencing Jennie Enterprise.
